column6:
Only 10 miles to the new Circuit of Americas F1 Gran Prix and 12 miles to Downtown Austin, UT, 6th Street and more. There is a corner store gas station, fast food and small grocery at the entrance of the neighborhood.

Our house consists of 2 bedrooms, 2 full baths, a fully-equipped kitchen, a living room, an outside patio with gas BBQ, and a private back yard. 
The rooms are equipped with one queen bed, one full size bed and one air mattress if it is needed. Wi-Fi Internet is available throughout. 

We have street parking for one or two cars.

Our house is non-smoking inside. If smoking outside please discard properly.
